src:
Ada Produk Pakai Logo Sang Pisang, Kaesang Tidak Akan Lapor
03 Nov 2019, 12:24 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta -Kaesang Pangarep enggan melaporkan salah satu bisnis UMKM yang menggunakan logo produk pisangnya. Ia hanya menegur usaha tersebut untuk tidak menggunakan logo itu. "Saya enggak balas dan enggak akan ngelaporin, tapi kan saya juga ada tim kan," ujar dia di M Bloc, Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Kaesang menjelaskan, logo Sang Pisang sudah dihak patenkan oleh dirinya. Sehingga, jika ada yang menggunakan untuk keperluan bisnis akan bermasalah hukum. Namun, saat ini ia mengatakan tidak akan memproses ke ranah hukum.
Alasannya, Kaesang menjelaskan mungkin pengusaha UMKM tersebut tidak mengerti soal hukum dagang. Sehingga, ia memberi tahu untuk tidak menggunakan merek dagangnya berjualan.
Kaesang mengatakan ia begitu mendukung UMKM, kemudian ia menuturkan pengusaha butuh literasi soal ha tersebut. "Kami bantu agar tidak asal ambil hak cipta orang lain," ucap dia.
Perihal Kaesang memberikan teguran lewat Twitter, ia mengatakan akun tersebut langsung menghapus logo Sang Pisang yang digunakannya. Akun tersebut juga merespon dengan baik permintaan Kaesang.
Hari ini, Kaesang hadir dalam talk show yang diselenggarakan oleh Senyawa+. Festival ini merupakan wadah kreator dari berbagai industri bertemu dan berkolaborasi untuk menciptakan inovasi baru.
Senyawa+ diselenggarakan di M Bloc, Jakarta selama dua hari dari tanggal 2-3 November 2019. Talkshow ini diselenggarakan di dua panggung, yaitu di Livehose dan Oeang Restaurant.
text:
There Are Products Using The Banana Logo, Kaesang Will Not Report
03 Nov 2019, 12:24 by Chitra Paramaesti, Istiqomatul Hayati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kaesang Pangarep is reluctant to report one of the MSME businesses that uses the banana product logo. He only rebuked the effort for not using the logo. "I will not reply and I will not report it, but I also have a team, right?" He said at M Bloc, Sunday, November 3, 2019.
Kaesang explained, the Banana logo was patented by him. So, if someone uses it for business purposes, there will be legal problems. However, at this time he said he would not proceed to the realm of law.
The reason, Kaesang explained, maybe the SME businessman did not understand the matter of commercial law. So, he told me not to use his trademark to sell.
Kaesang said he was so supportive of MSMEs, then he said entrepreneurs needed literacy about the matter. "We help so as not to take copyright other people," he said.
Regarding Kaesang giving a warning via Twitter, he said the account immediately deleted the Banana logo that he used. The account also responded well to Kaesang's request.
Today, Kaesang was present at a talk show hosted by Sen compound +. This festival is a place for creators from various industries to meet and collaborate to create new innovations.
Compound + was held at M Bloc, Jakarta for two days from November 2-3, 2019. The talkshow was held on two stages, namely at Livehose and Oeang Restaurant.
